Tucson listens as Talon drives him.  His suspension absorbs the shocks of t=
he uneven terrain but his engine proves quiet enough so conversation was no=
t lost during the drive.

"I'll be sure we are kept well guarded Perceptor.=
 I'd hate for anyone to fall into harm's way. And to answer your question P=
erceptor, her origin is somewhat like yours.  But like Talon, you too have =
risen from darkness.  That is what is most important, rising from darkness =
and into the light.  When we get back to the Ark, I too, will drive into th=
e light, as soon as my optical sensors are brought back online permanently.=
  So good news Talon, you won't have to drive me for much longer hopefully.=
"

He thinks for a moment about his disability, and the fact that Perceptor=
 too, was blind.

"I hope you don't mind me asking this question Perceptor,=
 but, if we could help you to regain your sight, would you allow us to do s=
o?"
